name: reinspect
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to look at something or someone carefully for a second time, especially to check that everything is correct and legal: They re-inspected the site a few weeks later to make sure the changes had been made. The inspectors will return in June to reinspect the entire hospital. Related words
inspect
reinspection
More examplesFewer examplesThe health authority said that it would reinspect the clinic in the light of the incident. Election officials have been reinspecting the rejected ballot papers.They ordered her to make the repairs immediately and said that they would re-inspect the house at the end of the month.
